entry.title: Russia Claims Gains in Battle for Bakhmut
entry.content: Russian forces said they had made new advances in their effort to encircle the eastern Ukrainian city of Bakhmut, while European leaders arrived in Kyiv to discuss further military aid.Â

entry.title: Gautam Adani's $147 Billion Fortune Is Eroding Swiftly
entry.content: The Indian businessman built an empire, the Adani Group, by working closely with the Modi government. A critical report by a U.S. short seller has put it at risk.
